name: sneaky-goblins-frontend-development-wrapper
description: This section is only used for local development, to ease the development.

scripts.initialize: cd frontend && echo '********* Installing Frontend Deps *********' && yarn && cd ../server && echo '********** Installing Server Deps **********' && yarn && cd ../
scripts.start: echo '************ Starting Local Development ***************' && cd frontend && yarn start && cd ../
scripts.start:vercel: echo '************ Starting Vercel DEV ***************' && cd frontend && yarn build && cd ../ && vercel dev
scripts.deploy: echo '************ Building and Deploying to Vercel ***************' && cd frontend && yarn build && cd ../ && vercel
